Name: VR CHINESE KUNG FU
About the game: In the game, players will be incarnated as the most famous mythical hero of the mysterious East - Monkey King. From the perspective of VR, fly through the clouds and travel freely in the scene. Visit and challenge the characters in each immortal to experience the true oriental immortal culture. Game Features A fantasy world with pure oriental characteristics - this is a fantasy world with pure oriental characteristics, whether it is scenery, architecture or character modeling, it is a real oriental characteristic Flying through the clouds, exploring freelyâ€”the world of Oriental Xianxia is indispensable, that is, flying. Players can fly freely in the whole world and experience the meaning of 'roaming the universe' in oriental culture Pure fighting, fist to flesh - control Sun Wukong to fight with various masters, and experience the refreshing feeling of fighting in the world of Xianxia. Of course, in fighting, the oriental culture of 'pointing to the end' is essential.
